data.prayer: Father, we pray that the people of Wielkopolskie, Poland will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Wielkopolskie, Poland
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Wielkopolskie, Poland to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Wielkopolskie to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Spirit, help the 10,576 believers find a person of peace today among the 3,397,724 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Turk people. Make the Turk people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Wielkopolskie, Poland to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 10,576 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Wielkopolskie.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
